Description: Body sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery phiale mesomphalos; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black with two pairs of faded added white bands; exterior: part of lotus flower with added red centres with group of short vertical strokes underneath.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1991) (phase 2)
